Property.Name: MAX_NUM_TIME_TAGS_TO_COLLECT
Property.Description: Maximum number of time tags which can be collected by worker

Property.Name: num_time_tags_to_collect
Property.Description: Number of time tags to collect during an application. Must be less than or equal to MAX_NUM_TIME_TAGS_TO_COLLECT

Property.Name: calibration_value
Property.Description: Value is subtracted from all collected time tags before storing
